name: Emtec
overview: Emtec, Inc., an information technology (IT) systems integrator, provides consulting, staffing, application services, and infrastructure solutions in the United States and Canada. It offers procurement services, including planning, designing, procuring, deploying, installing the software on, and maintaining the hardware and networks of its clients. The company deploys and maintains a range of equipment, such as workstations, servers, networking and communications equipment, enterprise computing products, and application software. It also provides infrastructure consulting services, including IT business alignment and planning, IT operations and support, IT practices and governance, and data storage solutions; enterprise computing solutions comprising product sourcing, network design and implementation, technical support, server consolidation, virtualization, and clustering and load balancing for high availability; data communications solutions consisting of local area network/wide area network and data wireless connectivity, voice over IP, and cabling solutions; and managed infrastructure services, such as lifecycle management services, support services contracts, and training services.
